ThingDef.label: nutrient paste (insect)
ThingDef.description: A sticky slime...made from insect meat. You don't even want to think about what the tube it comes in is made out of.

li.label: ate insect meat-paste
li.description: Not only did I consume nutrient-paste from a tube, but it was made from gray, slimy insect meat. The gear-oil from the machine partly covered the taste, but the texture and aftertaste were still easily identifiable.

ThingDef.label: nutrient brick (insect)
ThingDef.description: A crumbly brick of dehydrated nutrient paste...made from insect meat. You don't even want to think about what the wrapper it comes in is made out of.

li.label: ate insect meat-brick
li.description: Not only did I consume a crumbly, burnt nutrient-brick, but it was made from gray, slimy insect meat. The gear-oil and burnt flavor from the machine partly covered the taste, but the texture and aftertaste were still easily identifiable.
